mapper.select: SELECT su.business_unit as 'unit', su.department as 'department' FROM sys_project sp left join sa_user su on sp.create_user_id = su.id group by su.business_unit, su.department
SELECT DISTINCT su.business_unit as 'unit' FROM sys_project sp left join sa_user su on sp.create_user_id = su.id

SELECT su.username as 'username', su.real_name as 'realName',su.department as 'department', su.business_unit as 'unit', name as 'projectName', COUNT(sp.id) as 'numOfProject', sp.hours as 'hours', sp.credit as 'credit', sp.begin_time as 'beginTime', sp.end_time as 'endTime', sp.create_time as 'createTime', sp.id as 'projectId' FROM sys_project sp
LEFT JOIN sa_user su on sp.create_user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_activity sa on sp.id = sa.project_id WHERE
su.real_name like concat('%', #{condition.realName}, '%')
and su.username like concat('%', #{condition.username}, '%')
and sp.create_time between #{condition.beginTime} and #{condition.endTime}
GROUP BY sp.id, su.business_unit order by su.username
